title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park     Â    Do you care about Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park? Would you like to help preserve the wonderfully rich natural and cultural resources protected here? There are many ways to become more involved ...     Support your park through philanthropic donations.  Spend a few hours or a lifetime as a volunteer in the park. Purchase books and gifts at the parks Cooperating Associations bookstore inside the Park's Visitor Center. Take pride in your park and help protect it for future generations. Do not pick plants or disturb animal. Put litter in its proper place and please recycle! Support stewardship of the park by becoming educated about the park's natural and cultural resources. Keep informed on park issues and provide comment during park planning processes. Be a good steward by obeying park regulations, including, but not limited to: keeping dogs leashed and picking up after your pet; glass containers are not allowed on the river; properly disposing of fishing lines; and not using metal detectors.
